sx.blah.discord.util

Class MessageBuilder

  • java.lang.Object
    • sx.blah.discord.util.MessageBuilder

  • public class MessageBuilder
extends Object
    Utility class designed to make message sending easier.

    • Nested Class Summary

      static class  MessageBuilder.Styles
      Enum describing Markdown formatting that can be used in chat.

      • build

        public IMessage build()
               throws RateLimitException,
                      DiscordException,
                      MissingPermissionsException
        Galactic law requires I have a build() method in my builder classes. Sends and creates the message object.
        Returns:
        The message object representing the sent message.
        Throws:
        RateLimitException
        DiscordException
        MissingPermissionsException
